1.content: Create Moksh Dudeja's professional portfolio website
1.details: Build a modern portfolio showcasing AI/ML expertise, web development skills, internships, and education. Include sections: Hero, About, Experience, Skills, Achievements, Education, Contact. Use modern design with dark/tech theme.

2.content: Deploy and commit portfolio to GitHub
2.details: Create new repository 'mokshdudeja-portfolio' and commit all portfolio files with proper deployment configuration.
